definition: to murmur endearments (idiom)/to get into a romantic relationship
surname Tan
to speak/to talk/to converse/to chat/to discuss
feeling/emotion/passion/situation
to persuade
to speak/to say/to explain/to scold/to tell off/a theory (typically the last character in a compound, as in 日心說|日心说 heliocentric theory)
to love/to be fond of/to like/affection/to be inclined (to do sth)/to tend to (happen)

sentences.english: Such people are not eligible talked of love.
sentences.chinese: 這種人無資格談情說愛。

sentences.english: Sally and I don''t have any romantic interest in each other.
sentences.chinese: 我和莎莉都沒有談情說愛的意思。

sentences.english: All the women here speak French, the language of love.
sentences.chinese: 這裏的美女會講世上最適合談情說愛的語言法語。

sentences.english: Do you still remember we had amorism in the blossom ocean last March?
sentences.chinese: 你曾否記得去年三月我們在花海中談情說愛呢？

sentences.english: Riddle is widely used when young Myanmar are dating.
sentences.chinese: 猜謎語是緬族男女青年談情說愛的媒介。

sentences.english: Do not make love before an audience, unless you are on the stage.
sentences.chinese: 在戲院裏不要談情說愛，除非你是在舞臺上表演。

sentences.english: There can be no mooning and spooning about it. I mean to marry money .
sentences.chinese: 我不會浪費時間去談情說愛，我就是爲了錢而結婚。

sentences.english: We'll leave the two young people to bill and coo together.
sentences.chinese: 我們讓那兩個年輕人一起去談情說愛吧。

sentences.english: The park is a favorite spot for the students to romance their girl-friends.
sentences.chinese: 公園是學生們最喜歡與女友談情說愛的場所。

sentences.english: There were several couples spooning at the riverside.
sentences.chinese: 河邊有好幾對男女在談情說愛。

sentences.english: ROME (Reuters) - Italians generally love their mobile phones and often conduct love affairs over them.
sentences.chinese: 意大利人大都喜愛手機，還常常用它們來談情說愛。

sentences.english: Dandelions were my way of giving them love and affection.
sentences.chinese: 蒲公英就是我跟她們談情說愛時的定情物。

sentences.english: The park was full of lovers billing and cooing under the tress.
sentences.chinese: 公園樹下盡是談情說愛的情侶。

sentences.english: There were several courting couples in the park.
sentences.chinese: 公園裏有幾對談情說愛的男女。

definition: passionate love (idiom)
see 直截了當|直截了当[zhi2 jie2 liao3 dang4]
affectionate/intimate/warmhearted/to get intimate with sb
to tease a woman by pretending to be displeased with her/to flirt with a member of the opposite sex/to banter flirtatiously
to blab/to shoot one's mouth off/to commit a gaffe
to fawn on/to curry favor with/to make up to
lit. wading in mud and water/a slovenly job/sloppy
to have one's spirits dampened/to feel disappointed
to tell the truth/to tell it as it is
profound mystery
change of affection, shift of love (idiom); to change one's feelings to another love/to fall in love with sb else
to overdose on supplementary medicine/to cram too hard
to force someone to do something
When you enter a village, follow the local customs (idiom); do as the natives do/When in Rome, do as the Romans do
shady relationship/affair/adulterous relationship
to enquire solicitously about sb's well-being (idiom)/to pamper
